div.bibl: Rovnost Ludu, (Equality of People) Chicago, Illinois, June 3, 1908. (Weekly) [POLICE BEAT UNEMPLOYED SEEKING WORK]

body.p: Three thousand workers were brutally beaten by police when false propaganda spread that ten thousand men would be employed by the Illinois Steel Company. The men began coming to the entrance at 6 AM. and about 7 AM a vast throng stood by the gate awaiting entrance.
The Directors getting fearful called the police who immediately dispersed the crowd.
